Description: Flint tool/implement, pointed; made on tabular flake. Steep flaking on one side only. Cortex remaining.
Curator's comments: Found in a partly disturbed burial of a male within a collection of a variety of materials that the excavator characterized as ‘an artisan’s odds and ends.’
Bibliographic references: Brunton 1937 / Mostagedda and the Tasian Culture (p. 34; pl. 23.5)
